title: Train Fault on East West Line

updates.text: [EWL] CLEARED: Train services from #Kembangan towards #PasirRis are now running normally.
[EWL] UPDATE: Train service is resuming from #Kembangan towards #PasirRis.  Trains would be travelling at slower speed.
[EWL]: Estimate 20 mins additional travelling time from #Kembangan to #PasirRis towards PasirRis due to train fault.
